alert.note: Alert for Barnstable (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 9:16PM EDT until July 29 at 9:45PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Boston/Norton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Barnstable County in southeastern Massachusetts... * Until 945 PM EDT. * At 916 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Provincetown, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Provincetown, Wellfleet and Truro. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
